selector.title: Skills
selector.emptyHint: Place SKILL.md files in .skills/ directory to add skills
selector.activeHint: Skill activated, will be applied automatically in conversations

card.author: Author
card.selectSkillToViewDetails: Select a skill to view details

skillType.compositeHint: Composite skills suggest loading other related skills
skillType.standaloneHint: Standalone skills contain a complete toolset

errors.defaultActivationFailed: The following default skills failed to activate: {{skills}}. Please check the skills management page.
errors.activateFailedRetry: Failed to activate skill "{{name}}", please retry

management.title: Skills Management
management.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete skill "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
management.default_hint: Default skills will be automatically activated when creating new chats
management.import_overwrite_confirm: Skill "{{name}}" already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?

editor.id_hint: Only letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores allowed
editor.name: Name
editor.author: Author
editor.dependencies_hint: Hard dependencies: auto-loaded when this skill is activated
editor.related_skills_hint: Soft relation: for recommendation only, not auto-loaded
editor.disable_auto_invoke_hint: When enabled, skill must be manually activated
editor.content_hint: Use Markdown format for skill instructions
editor.no_tools_hint: Click the button above to add a tool definition
editor.tool_description_placeholder: Describe the tool's function and use cases...
editor.embedded_tools_hint: Embedded tools are injected into the LLM request when the skill is activated

builtinDescriptions.knowledge-retrieval: Find and cite relevant knowledge from your library and external sources.
builtinDescriptions.canvas-note: Turn ideas into structured notes, summaries, and reusable snippets.
builtinDescriptions.vfs-memory: Store, recall, and update long-term memory snippets and references.
builtinDescriptions.learning-resource: Curate learning resources and suggest study materials.
builtinDescriptions.todo-tools: Create, update, and track tasks with a structured todo list.
builtinDescriptions.anki-tools: Generate, manage, and export Anki cards from learning materials.
builtinDescriptions.qbank-tools: Create and manage question banks with tagging and practice modes.
builtinDescriptions.workspace-tools: Coordinate workspace collaboration actions and logs.
builtinDescriptions.web-fetch: Fetch and summarize web content when up-to-date info is needed.
builtinDescriptions.subagent-worker: Delegate sub-tasks to specialized subagents and merge results.
builtinDescriptions.tutor-mode: Socratic tutor that guides learning through questions and hints.
builtinDescriptions.chatanki: End-to-end pipeline to turn documents into reviewable Anki cards.
builtinDescriptions.literature-review: Plan and draft literature reviews from papers and notes.
builtinDescriptions.card-forge-mode: Focused card generation mode with structured prompts and review.
builtinDescriptions.research-mode: Deep research mode for exploration, synthesis, and citations.
builtinDescriptions.deep-student: Default learning strategy that combines memory production/consumption with lightweight user questioning.
builtinDescriptions.dstu-memory-orchestrator: Default memory strategy: local-first unified retrieval, selective memory consumption, and gated long-term memory writes.
builtinDescriptions.mindmap-tools: Create and organize mind maps from topics and notes.
builtinDescriptions.attachment-tools: Parse and extract text or metadata from uploaded files.

default.label: Default
default.hint: Default skills will be auto-activated when creating new sessions

parser.embeddedToolsMissingName: embeddedTools[{{index}}] is missing required field: name
parser.embeddedToolsMissingDescription: embeddedTools[{{index}}] is missing required field: description
parser.embeddedToolsMissingInputSchema: embeddedTools[{{index}}] is missing required field: inputSchema
parser.yamlRequired: SKILL.md must start with YAML frontmatter (--- delimited)
parser.emptyContent: Skill content is empty, please add instructions
parser.frontmatterTooLong: Frontmatter too long, parsing may fail

validation.id_invalid: Skill ID can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens (a-z, 0-9, -)
validation.id_reserved: Skill ID cannot contain reserved words
validation.name_format: Name can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
validation.name_reserved: Name cannot contain reserved words such as deep-student
validation.description_too_short: Description should be at least 50 characters for better LLM discovery
